## GridProGenesisDatasource.handleStreamDeletes() method

Handles stream deletes by removing records from the grid.

**Signature:**

```typescript
handleStreamDeletes(deletes?: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deletes | any\[\] | _(Optional)_ List of records to remove from the grid stream |

void
